channel.title: A very good version of fletching?
channel.description:
well i added a version of fletching but it was very good cause when you fletched a log it just fletched a shortbow. not a long bow or arrow shafts. so im looking for one the best fletching with all of it, it can fletch everything, when you want to fletch you have a interface so you can choose which you want to fletch.
kind of liek this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,140102.0.html
but his is glitched because when you want to fletch andthing above oaks it wont work :( unless you can fix up the code orknow a tutorial like that, that works. plz post
